actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Indian Health Care Improvement Act to exclude any prohibitions relating to the provisions of abortions.

summary.text: Amends the Indian Health Care Improvement Act to direct that no program for which funds are authorized which directly or indirectly provide health services shall exclude from such programs or services the provision of abortions as a health service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Indian Health Care Improvement Act to exclude any prohibitions relating to the provisions of abortions.
